description: The finale of Fire Force Season 3 ramps up the action and mystery, keeping fans on edge. With a global IMDb rating of 7.6/10, Crunchyroll will stream the concluding episodes in January 2026, delivering an explosive mix of adventure, supernatural powers, and emotional storytelling
title: Fire Force Season 3 Release Date: When, Where to Watch the Shonen Anime's Final Arc

description: Google is working on a major “UX 2.0” overhaul for the Gemini app to address complaints about clutter and usability. According to a company executive, the redesign will focus on improving the overall user experience rather than just updating visual elements. Google is also developing a macOS version of the app, marking its first AI-powered desktop application. No release timeline has been shared yet.
title: Gemini App to Get a Major Design Upgrade, Could Soon Be Launched on macOS

description: Europe has secured its first astronaut seat to orbit the Moon through NASA’s Artemis program, marking a historic milestone for ESA. Director General Josef Aschbacher confirmed that a German astronaut will take the inaugural European lunar-orbit mission, enabled by Europe’s contributions to Orion’s service module and the Lunar Gateway. Veteran astronauts Matthias Maurer and Alexander Gerst are leading candidates for the Artemis flights planned for 2028–2030.
title: Germany to Send First European Astronaut Around the Moon on Artemis Mission

description: Astronomers in India have identified 53 previously unknown giant radio quasars powered by supermassive black holes, each releasing enormous plasma jets reaching up to 7.2 million light-years—nearly 50 times the Milky Way’s diameter. Using GMRT data, the team expanded the catalog of known giant quasars and offered valuable clues about how black holes grow, merge, and influence the intergalactic medium across vast cosmic distances.
title: Indian Team Finds 53 Massive Quasars Blasting Jets Millions of Light-Years Long

description: Madhuri Dixit returns in a powerful new avatar with Mrs Deshpande, a crime-thriller series releasing on JioHotstar in December 2025. The show revolves around a notorious serial killer who teams up with the police to catch a copycat, leading to intense confrontations and emotional drama.
title: Mrs Deshpande OTT Release: When, Where to Watch Madhuri Dixit's Serial Killer Mystery

description: NASA’s Perseverance rover has captured the first confirmed mini-lightning sparks in Mars’ dusty atmosphere. Using its sensitive microphone, the rover recorded 55 tiny electrical discharges during dust storms over two Martian years. These sparks generate reactive chemicals that can break down organic molecules, affecting future life-detection efforts. The discovery also highlights potential risks to spacecraft electronics and the need for better monitoring of Martian electric fields.
title: NASA’s Perseverance Records First-Ever Mini-Lightning on Mars

description: Ayushmann Khurrana and Rashmika Mandanna bring a mix of love, laughs, and vampire mayhem in Thamma, the newest entry in the Maddock Horror-Comedy Universe. With strong box-office performance and an IMDb rating of 6/10, the film arrives on Prime Video this December for fans to enjoy its supernatural twists and playful storytelling.
title: Thamma Is Now Available on Amazon Prime: How to Watch Ayushmann Khurrana's Horror Comedy

description: Streaming from December 12 on JioHotstar, The Great Shamsuddin Family brings a heartfelt and warm family story that explores dreams, responsibilities, and emotional bonds. With simple storytelling and strong emotional moments, it promises to connect with audiences of all ages.
title: The Great Shamsuddin Family OTT Release: When, Where to Watch the Peepli Live Director's Comedy Drama

description: Vivo X300 Pro is a great smartphone for camera enthusiasts, and it also supports the Telephoto Extender Kit, which was exclusive to the Ultra model until last year. Everyday performance is top-notch, and the battery is one of the biggest strengths of the X300 Pro. It is among a handful of devices that can click amazing portrait shots regardless of light conditions. For Rs. 109,999, the X300 Pro is a flagship offering from the house of Vivo that takes on the likes of the Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra and the iPhone 17 Pro.
title: Vivo X300 Pro Review: Flagship Mobile Photography. Redefined.

description: Wake Up Dead Man: A Knives Out Mystery marks the third installment in the Knives Out franchise and continues Rian Johnson’s signature style of smart, character-driven mysteries. Featuring Daniel Craig, Josh O’Connor, Mila Kunis, Glenn Close and more, the film explores themes of faith, loyalty and hidden motives in a small-town parish.
title: Wake Up Dead Man: A Knives Out Mystery OTT Release: When, Where to Watch the Daniel Craig Whodunit

description: Samsung unveiled the Galaxy Z TriFold with a 10.0-inch main display and a 6.5-inch cover screen. The launch of Samsung's first multi-folding smartphone heats up the competition in the foldable smartphone market. The Chinese brand Huawei launched the industry's first three-way folding phone last September. Here's a quick comparison to help you find out the similarities and differences between the Samsung Galaxy Z TriFold and the Huawei Mate XT Ultimate Design
title: Samsung Galaxy Z TriFold vs Huawei Mate XT Ultimate Design: Features and Specifications Compared

description: Sony Bank is developing a US dollar-backed stablecoin aimed at simplifying payments across Sony’s entertainment ecosystem. The project is currently under regulatory review in the US and is being built with stablecoin provider Bastion. Sony has already begun experimenting with crypto payments, including enabling USDC purchases in Singapore, signalling a wider shift towards digital currency integration across its global platforms.
title: Sony Bank Plans US Dollar Stablecoin to Support Game, Anime Payments by 2026

description: New data suggests Amazon’s AI shopping assistant Rufus helped boost both engagement and sales during Black Friday. According to Sensor Tower, shopping sessions with Rufus rose 86 percent compared to a recent non-sale day, while purchases from Rufus-assisted sessions were 75 percent higher than non-Rufus ones. Adoption is still limited, but the trend indicates growing comfort with AI-guided shopping.
title: Amazon’s Rufus AI Chatbot Helps Drive Black Friday Sales and Engagement, Data Shows

description: Punjab National Bank (PNB) offers several convenient online methods for checking account balances, making banking easier for customers. Users can view their balance through the PNB ONE mobile app, PNB Internet Banking, UPI apps, WhatsApp banking, SMS banking or the missed call service. These tools provide quick access to balance details, mini statements and recent transactions without visiting a branch or ATM. With multiple digital options available, PNB customers can manage their finances anytime and stay updated with just a few taps or messages.
title: PNB Balance Check Number: How to Check PNB Balance Online Using Different Methods

description: WhatsApp released its new 'Remind Me' feature to select beta testers earlier this year as part of the WhatsApp beta for Android 2.25.21.14 update. While the functionality is still being tested, it is expected to be rolled out via a stable channel to other users in the coming months. The instant messaging platform, with this feature, will allow users to set a time when they wish to receive a notification to remind them to reply to a message they have already read.
title: How to Set Up a WhatsApp Message Reminder: A Step-by-Step Guide

description: Watch the love story of Indra and Anu when they are left with multiple misunderstandings and threats. Hence, as the tagline goes, Love will save you or destroy you only on Adda Times.
title: Khujechi Toke Raat Berate OTT Release: When and Where to Watch This Bengali Series Online?

description: Redmi 15C 5G will be launched in India on December 3 with a 50-megapixel dual rear camera setup, the Chinese smartphone maker has confirmed. This is the same rear camera unit as the handset's Polish counterpart, which was launched in September. It is confirmed to be powered by a MediaTek Dimensity 6000 series chipset, which is expected to be paired with up to 6GB of RAM and up to 128GB of internal storage. It is confirmed to pack a 6,000mAh battery, which is claimed to provide up to 329.7 hours of standby time.
title: Redmi 15C 5G Camera Details Confirmed a Day Ahead of Launch in India: Expected Specifications, Features

description: Xiaomi’s Redmi Note 15 series, already launched in China, is expected to debut globally soon, with new leaks detailing European pricing, battery capacities and key specifications. The Redmi Note 15 5G may start at EUR 299, the Note 15 Pro 5G at EUR 399 and the Note 15 Pro+ 5G at EUR 499. EPREL listings suggest battery sizes ranging from 5,520mAh to 6,580mAh. The phones are tipped to feature 6.83-inch displays, up to 200-megapixel cameras, Snapdragon or Dimensity chipsets and up to 100W fast charging.
title: Redmi Note 15 5G Series Price, Battery Capacity and Other Key Features Leaked Ahead of Anticipated Global Debut

description: Samsung Galaxy S26 series is expected to launch soon. Ahead of the formal reveal, a prominent tipster has suggested the key specifications of the Galaxy S26 and Galaxy S26+. Both models are said to retain similar rear camera units, RAM, refresh rate and peak brightness as their predecessors. The Galaxy S26 is tipped to come with a 4,300mAh battery and a  6.3-inch display.
title: Samsung Galaxy S26, Galaxy S26+ Hardware Upgrades Spotted in Leaked Comparison With Galaxy S25 Counterparts

description: The James Sweeney Directorial Twinless is a story of two friends who bond over the loss of their identical twins. They develop a strong friendship and end up discovering strange secrets about each other, now available to watch on rent on Amazon Prime Video and Apple TV.
title: Twinless Now Available for Rent on Amazon Prime Video and Apple TV: What You Need to Know

description: The Vivo X300 has a premium design and a sleek profile. The handset packs a vivid 6.31-inch AMOLED display with good viewing angles. The handset also comes with a MediaTek Dimensity 9500 processor, which is capable of delivering flagship performance. The phone also features a triple-camera setup that delivers professional-grade results in different lighting conditions. The device also features a large 6,040mAh battery and comes loaded with 90W fast charging support.
title: Vivo X300 Review: Pro Power, Pocket Size

description: Apple has appointed AI researcher Amar Subramanya as its new Vice President of AI, replacing John Giannandrea. Subramanya, who previously led Google’s Gemini Assistant and briefly worked at Microsoft, will report to Craig Federighi. Apple says his expertise will support upcoming Apple Intelligence features as the company works to catch up in the competitive AI landscape.
title: Who Is Amar Subramanya? Indian-Origin Researcher Taking Reigns of Apple’s AI Division

description: Bitcoin’s price remained above $86,000 (roughly Rs. 77.3 lakh) on Tuesday after buyers defended key support levels following a volatile weekend marked by heavy liquidations. Altcoins also remained weak, with Solana, XRP, BNB and Dogecoin extending weekly declines. Analysts say traders are watching macro triggers closely, especially shifting US Federal Reserve expectations, as the broader crypto market continues to consolidate.
title: Bitcoin Price Rises After Sharp Drop as Altcoins Face Renewed Pressure

description: Google is reportedly preparing to add a Projects feature to Gemini, offering a sandboxed space where users can group multiple chats under a single topic. An APK teardown of the latest Google app beta revealed the interface, including options to set a project focus, upload files and organise work. The feature is still inactive and unannounced, and file uploads may be capped at 10 per project.
title: Google's Gemini Could Soon Be Updated With a ChatGPT-Style Projects Feature: Report

description: The Department of Telecommunications (DoT) recently directed smartphone makers to preload the Sanchar Saathi app on new devices. Reports suggested that OEMs would also have to ensure that users could not uninstall or disable the state-owned cybersecurity app. However, the government has now issued clarification on the same, stating that keeping it is completely optional, and the app can be removed from devices. Apple, meanwhile, does not reportedly plan to comply with the directive due to privacy and security issues for the iOS ecosystem.
title: Government Says Sanchar Saathi App Optional, Can Be Removed; Apple Reportedly Plans to Oppose Mandatory Installation

description: HMD XploraOne is teased to launch soon. The new device is designed specifically for kids, will support calling and texting functions and features both front and rear cameras. It comes preloaded with essential apps. It is said to run on the Unisoc T127 chipset.
title: HMD XploraOne Teased to Launch Soon as Kid-Friendly Phone; Specifications Tipped

description: Motorola is reportedly preparing a Swarovski Edition of the Motorola Edge 70, following earlier Swarovski-themed releases of the Razr 60 and Moto Buds Loop. A leak by a tipster shows the phone in Pantone’s Cloud Dancer shade with a vegan leather back, 14 Swarovski crystals and a silver frame. The launch date is unknown, but the poster appears official. The special edition is expected to keep the standard Edge 70’s specifications, including a 6.7-inch pOLED display, Snapdragon 7 Gen 4 chip, 50-megapixel cameras and a 4,800mAh battery.
title: Motorola Edge 70 Swarovski Edition With 14 Swarovski Crystals Leaked, Could Launch Soon

description: OpenAI appears to be testing ads in ChatGPT, according to leaked screenshots and code strings found in the app’s Android beta. References to search ads, targeting and carousels suggest early groundwork for an ad-led model, and at least one user has already seen a banner ad. While details remain unclear, ads will likely be limited to free and lower-tier plans rather than Plus or Pro.
title: OpenAI Said to Be Testing Ads on ChatGPT, Could Roll Out to More Users Soon

description: Poco C85 was launched globally earlier this year, in September. Now, the Chinese smartphone maker has announced that it will soon launch the Poco C85 5G in India. It will be equipped with a 50-megapixel primary rear AI camera, housed inside a sqaure camera module. Moreover, a dedicated microsite for the phone is now live on Flipkart, confirming its availability in the country via the e-commerce platform. Reports suggest that the phone will be powered by a different MediaTek chipset in India than its global counterpart.
title: Poco C85 5G India Launch Teased; 50-Megapixel Rear Camera, Flipkart Availability Confirmed

description: Samsung Galaxy Buds 4 renders have surfaced online, revealing the design of the rumoured true wireless stereo (TWS), according to a report. This comes soon after the animations of the Samsung Galaxy Buds 4 Pro were spotted in the One UI 8.5 firmware. The design of the vanilla Galaxy Buds 4 appear to be similar to the Pro model. However, there is one significant difference between the two. While the Galaxy Buds 4 Pro were shown with silicone eartips, the standard model appears without them.
title: Samsung Galaxy Buds 4 Design Leak Indicates It Could Resemble the Samsung Galaxy Buds 4 Pro

description: Leaks suggest Samsung is developing several new One UI 8.5 features that may be exclusive to the Galaxy S26 series. The tools were enabled by a leaker using an internal AI build. Key additions include Now Nudges for contextual lock screen information, Wallpaper Live Effects for 3D parallax wallpapers, a Creative Studio for custom wallpaper creation and a Type to Edit photo tool. These features do not appear on current models. One UI 8.5 is expected to launch with the Galaxy S26 in February 2026.
title: Samsung Galaxy S26 Could Feature Revamped Lock Screen Customisation, 3D Wallpaper Effects, One UI 8.5 Leak Shows

description: Vivo has launched the X300 in India alongside the X300 Pro. The phone features a 6.31-inch 1.5K AMOLED display, the MediaTek Dimensity 9500 chipset and OriginOS 6 based on Android 16. It includes a Zeiss-tuned triple rear camera setup with a 200-megapixel main sensor, two 50-megapixel secondary cameras and a 50-megapixel front camera. The device packs a 6,040mAh battery with 90W wired and 40W wireless charging.
title: Vivo X300 Launched in India With 6.31-Inch 1.5K OLED Display, 200-Megapixel Main Camera: Price, Features

description: Vivo X300 Pro has been launched in India. The new phone comes with a MediaTek Dimensity 9500 chipset and 16GB RAM. It has a triple rear camera unit, comprising a 200-megapixel periscope sensor. It has a 50-megapixel selfie shooter and a 6,510mAh battery with 90W wired and 40W wireless charging support. The new phone has a 6.78-inch display with 1.5K resolution.
title: Vivo X300 Pro Launched in India With 200-Megapixel Telephoto Camera, 6,510mAh Battery: Price, Specifications

description: Google is all set to host an Android XR event on December 8. The event is teased to provide major updates for extended reality devices. Teased as covering “glasses to headsets and everything in between,” the event is expected to spotlight Android XR advancements. The event will be livestreamed via the Android Developers’ YouTube channel. The teaser video posted by Google shows two Android bots.
title: Google Schedules Android XR Event for December 8; Updates About Glasses, Headsets Expected

description: Oppo A6x 5G has been launched in India. It will be offered, starting today, via Amazon, Flipkart, and the Oppo India online store. It is powered by an octa core MediaTek Dimensity 6300 chipset, coupled with up to 6GB of LPDDR4x RAM and up to 128GB of UFS 2.2 internal storage. It carries a 13-megapixel primary camera, which can record up to 1080p resolution videos. The new handset also features a 5-megapixel front-facing camera for selfies and video calls. It is backed by a 6,500mAh battery with 45W wired fast charging support.
title: Oppo A6x 5G Launched in India With 6,500mAh Battery, MediaTek Dimensity 6300: Price, Specifications

description: Ray-Ban Meta Gen 2 Glasses are now available for purchase in India via the leading e-commerce platforms. Developed in collaboration with EssilorLuxottica, the artificial intelligence (AI)-powered smart glasses were initially launched in September as the successor to the Ray-Ban Meta Gen 1 Glasses, but were only available in the global markets. Meta says they offer significant battery and camera upgrades over the first-generation model, along with wider colour and frame choices.
title: Ray-Ban Meta Gen 2 Glasses Now Available in India: Price, Availability

description: Amazon’s new AWS Interconnect tool preview has been launched by the US-based tech giant. The new tool will help customers establish private, secure, and high-speed connections between different cloud services. The company will soon start onboarding new cloud service providers as partners. However, currently, it has only partnered with Google Cloud. Later in 2026, the US-based company will also allow customers to create a link between Microsoft Azure and AWS.
title: Amazon's AWS Interconnect Preview Announced With Support for Private Links Between Cloud Services

description: Instagram is said to be testing a new limit for content discovery. According to a report, the Meta-owned social media platform is testing a restriction on the number of hashtags added to a post. Users are reportedly encountering a notice when they attempt to insert more than three hashtags. The new functionality, however, is yet to be announced and is believed to be part of a limited test before its wider rollout.
title: Instagram Reportedly Testing a Three-Hashtag Limit on Posts for Content Discovery

description: Just Corseca Skywatch Pro was launched recently in India with a 2.01-inch HD TFT display and Bluetooth calling support. It provides basic health tracking features, including heart rate, SPO2 and sleep monitoring. It also supports real-time sports tracking for activities like walking and running. Here is a closer look at its features and performance.
title: Just Corseca Skywatch Pro Review: A Budget Offering That Covers the Basics

description: OnePlus Pad Go 2 will be launched in India on December 17. Ahead of the launch, the tablet has surfaced on Geekbench. It is listed with Android 16 and a MediaTek processor coupled with 8GB of RAM. The OnePlus Pad Go 2 is likely to come with upgrades over the  OnePlus Pad Go, which was launched in 2023. It will be unveiled alongside the OnePlus 15R. The live launch event will take place in Bengaluru.
title: OnePlus Pad Go 2 Visits Geekbench With MediaTek Dimensity 7300 SoC, Android 16

description: Samsung’s newly listed SM-F971U device in the GSMA database is reportedly not a Flip FE but a new “Wide” Galaxy Z Fold variant planned for 2026. Its model number and H8 codename indicate a second high-end Fold developed alongside the standard Fold 8. Reports suggest a wider 18:9 cover display and an almost square 18:18 inner screen, addressing complaints about narrow Fold designs. The device is seen as a response to Apple’s expected foldable and may join Samsung’s expanding 2026 foldable lineup.
title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 8 Could Launch Alongside Wider Variant Listed in GSMA Database: Report

description: Apple has updated its list of vintage and obsolete devices to include several new products across categories. According to the brand, one of the main additions is the original iPhone SE, which was introduced in 2016. The handset, along with other products, has now been labelled obsolete, and its service and repairs will be limited. Other devices added to the list include iPad Pro 12.9-inch (2017), Apple Watch Series 4 Hermes and Nike models, and the Beats Pill 2.0.
title: iPhone SE, iPad Pro 12.9-Inch (Second Generation) Added to Apple's Vintage and Obsolete Products List

description: OnePlus will hold a live keynote for the launch of the OnePlus 15R and OnePlus Pad Go 2, the company announced on Monday. The upcoming products are scheduled to go official in India and the global markets on December 17. As per the company, the keynote event will take place in front of thousands of OnePlus Community members in India. OnePlus has also revealed several specifications of the OnePlus 15R and OnePlus Pad Go 2.
title: OnePlus 15R, OnePlus Pad Go 2 to Launch at Bengaluru Keynote; Key Specifications Revealed

description: Samsung Galaxy Z TriFold has been launched globally. The phone will initially be available in South Korea. However, the tech giant plans to make it available for purchase in other markets as well, including China, Taiwan, Singapore, the UAE, and the US. The smartphone sports a 10-inch AMOLED display on the inside with up to 120Hz refresh and a 6.5-inch AMOLED cover display with Full-HD+ resolution and up to 120Hz refresh rate. Qualcomm's octa core 3nm Snapdragon 8 Elite for Galaxy chipset powers the handset.
title: Samsung Galaxy Z TriFold Launched With 10-Inch Inner Display, 5,600mAh Battery: Price, Specifications

description: The Vivo X300 series is all set to go official in India today (November 2). The successor to the Vivo X200 lineup is confirmed to comprise the Vivo X300 and X300 Pro models. The brand has teased several details about the handsets, including their chipsets, in the weeks leading up to the launch. The Vivo X300 and Vivo X300 Pro are confirmed to be powered by MediaTek's flagship Dimensity 9500 chipset and will sport Zeiss-tuned cameras.
title: Vivo X300, Vivo X300 Pro Launching Today: Know Price in India, Features and Specifications
